basics.name: Mohammed Essaddek
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer | .NET Technical Expert
basics.summary:
üëã Welcome to my interactive terminal resume!

üöÄ I am an accomplished Senior Software Engineer and .NET Technical Expert with 10+ years of experience specializing in .NET technologies, cloud architecture, and DevOps practices. Currently leading technical initiatives at Teal Technology Services (OCP Subsidiary), I excel in architecting scalable solutions and mentoring development teams.

üí° Core Expertise:
‚Ä¢ Languages & Frameworks: C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, Next.js, Hono.js
‚Ä¢ Cloud & DevOps: Microsoft Azure (IoT Hub, Functions, App Services, DevOps), CI/CD, Docker, Infrastructure as Code
‚Ä¢ Database: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, MySQL
‚Ä¢ Architecture: Microservices, REST APIs, Event-Driven Design, Feature-Based Architecture
‚Ä¢ Monitoring & Observability: Grafana, Prometheus, Loki
‚Ä¢ Leadership: Technical Architecture, Code Review, Team Mentoring, Agile/Scrum
‚Ä¢ Tools: Visual Studio, VS Code, Azure DevOps, Git, Docker

üéØ Proven track record of delivering mission-critical applications including IoT tracking systems, government portals, enterprise-scale solutions, and SaaS platforms. Passionate about clean code, best practices, and continuous learning.

üìç Based in Morocco | Open to remote opportunities worldwide | Fluent in French, Arabic, and English

references.name: Yassine  AIT ELBAZ
references.reference: It is difficult to describe how impressed I was with Mohamed's work when I had the opportunity to work with him. I could not do better than to highly recommend Mohamed for his talents.

references.name: Tarik Fadli
references.reference: I hereby wish to recommend Mohammed ESSADDEK. Having had the opportunity to supervise Mr. ESSADDEK in his role as Development Consultant for over a year, I testify to his remarkable competence, adaptability and quality of his relationships with clients. He also demonstrates exceptional professionalism in his contacts with his peers and in his collaboration with management. Constantly progressing professionally, Mohammed is always looking for relevant ways to ensure success in his work. He represents a definite asset for any organization. It is therefore with eagerness that I recommend him.
